name: Dark Radio Personalities: The Game
description:
A PS1 style horror game based on the famously not famous Dark Radio Personalities audiodrama series.

(Which you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdWyO8GaQupaLGGZBng4pGA)

Very very early in development, but I was extremely proud of the title screen so I felt like I had to upload it.

Made for the HPS1 Wretched Weekend gamejam, to be expanded upon further in the future.

Controls:

WASDMoveLeft click/Up arrowLook upRight click/Down arrowLook downSpaceJumpShiftSprint
